overview:
With more than 15 years of hands-on experience in strategic planning, organizational development, sales management, business development, project and service management and system engineering strategies he has a successful record of leading diverse, and global, teams of professionals in the development of high-quality deliverables. He also showed peak performance while focusing on responsibilities and commitments in a variety of highly competitive industries, cutting-edge markets, and fast-paced environments.

Strong communicator and equally effective at identifying opportunities, developing focus and providing tactical business solutions with a consistent record of, and used to, forging strong business relationships with prospects and clients at C-suites level usually being positioned as a confident and trusted advisor.

Always performing with a global perspective in a competitive and fast-paced business environment with an extensive international business experience, travel and exposure to different projects and cultures with a wide array of innovative business approaches due to work experience in various countries, cultures and different industries.
